If I am a jet fighters in the war.

I am flying in the sky , you may call me 仆

街

I hit the airplane all the times.

Sometime I will fuck with some girls.

They call me the terminater.

Cause my heart will go on.

You may call me sleep early , the war is

over.

Once a day, I land in Hong Kong .

I will eat 菠蘿夾腸仔.

Wish me luck next year
